title: Welcome to the projects page
description: This is where I will speak about and demo projects I have worked on.

content.title: CHIP-8 Emulator
content.summary: Built a full emulator in C with a custom memory allocator and stack logic. Added debugging tools and plans to WebAssembly-port it for the website.

content.title: Blog Platform
content.summary: Full-stack MERN blog platform with Markdown editing, dynamic routing, and MongoDB persistence. Includes a contact form and user-friendly design.
